1088251937.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

items.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

oneOf.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

1088251937.title: Filter Group

3235433757.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

AND.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

NOT.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must fail in order for the group to pass.

OR.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

all.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

all_of.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

any.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

any_of.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

none_of.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must fail in order for the group to pass.

3235433757.title: Filter Group Map

domain.description: The domain the test should be performed in.

subject.description: The subject of this filter test.

test.description: The name of the test to apply.

value.description: The value being compared with the test.

check_if_outnumbered.description: If true, the mob will check if its outnumbered

cooldown.description: The amount of time in seconds that the mob has to wait before selecting a target of the same type again

filters.description: Conditions that make this entry in the list valid

max_dist.description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice

max_flee.description: Maximum distance this mob can be from the target to stop fleeing

max_height.description: Maximum height this mob can be away to be a valid choice

must_see.description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice

must_see_forget_duration.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more

reevaluate_description.description: If true, the mob will stop being targeted if it stops meeting any conditions.

sprint_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the sprinting speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

walk_speed_multiplier.description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

description: Allows the mob to offer a flower to another mob with the minecraft:take_flower behavior.

chance_to_start.description: Percent chance that the mob will start this goal, from 0 to 1.

follow_distance.description: The distance (in blocks) that the mob tries to be in range of the friend it's following.

friend_search_area.description: The dimensions of the AABB used to search for a potential friend to play with.

friend_types.description: The entity type(s) to consider when searching for a potential friend to play with.

max_play_duration_seconds.description: The max amount of seconds that the mob will play for before exiting the Goal.

random_pos_search_height.description: The height (in blocks) that the mob will search within to find a random position position to move to. Must be at least 1.

random_pos_search_range.description: The distance (in blocks) on ground that the mob will search within to find a random position to move to. Must be at least 1.

speed_multiplier.description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal.

title: minecraft:behavior.play
